contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Edam-Volendam |image_skyline = Volendam 20040902 2231.jpg |image_map = LocationEdam-Volendam.png |mapsize = 250px |image_flag = Flag of Edam-Volendam.svg |flag_size = 120x100px |image_shield = Coat of arms of Edam.svg |shield_size = 120x100px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Holland]] |leader_name = W.J.F.M. van Beek |leader_party = [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 24.78 |area_land_km2 = 16.31 |area_water_km2 = 8.47 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 28497 |population_density_km2 = 1747 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 52.50 |latNS = N |longd = 5.07 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.edam-volendam.nl www.edam-volendam.nl] }} '''Edam-Volendam''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Edam-Volendam.ogg}}) is a municipality in the northwest [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[North Holland]], consisting of the towns of [[Edam, Netherlands|Edam]] and [[Volendam]], whose centres lie just 3 km apart. ==Local government== The municipal council of Edam-Volendam consists of 21 seats, which are divided as follows: * Volendam80 - 6 seats * [[People's Party for Freedom and Democracy|VVD]] - 5 seats * [[Dutch Labour Party|PvdA]] - 4 seats * [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] - 3 seats * [[GreenLeft]] - 2 seats * LijstKras - 2 seats ==References== {{Reflist}} * Statistics are taken from the [http://www.sdu.nl/staatscourant/gemeentes/gem136nh.htm SDU Staatscourant] ==External links== * {{commons category-inline}} * [http://www.edam.com Tourist information about Edam] [[File:Vollendam harbour.jpg|thumb|center|The harbour at Volendam]] {{Geographic location | Centre = Edam-Volendam | North = [[Zeevang]] | East = ''[[Markermeer]]'' | South = [[Waterland]] | West = [[Purmerend]] }} {{North Holland Province}} [[Category:Edam-Volendam| ]] {{NorthHolland-geo-stub}}
